General

Colors

All Sass color variables prefixed with $color-. This makes it easy to figure out what a variable is for later.

Vanderbilt University Medical Center Brand Colors

$color-ice
#eef4f3
$color-frozen
#e3eae9
$color-gallery
#dfe4e3
$color-pacific
#027da7
$color-peacock
#02535a
$color-stormy
#354a58
$color-grass
#378163
